metadata.title: Full Stack Developer Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for Full Stack Developer positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven professional with experience in Working on both frontend and backend development. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing performance.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Led the development of a cloud-based application used by over 200,000 users, increasing company revenue by 15%.
Optimized backend services, reducing API response time by 30% and improving application performance.
Devised a streamlined CI/CD pipeline that reduced deployment time by 60%.

experience.title: Backend Developer
achievements: Engineered RESTful APIs supporting mobile and web platforms, handling over 50,000 daily requests.
Integrated third-party services, expanding application functionality and user engagement.
Mentored junior developers and co-led a team to transition a monolithic application to microservices architecture.

experience.title: Junior Developer
achievements: Contributed to front-end redesign projects, enhancing user experience and increasing user satisfaction by 20%.
Maintained code quality through consistent practices and collaborative code review sessions.
Assisted in developing full-stack applications as part of a cross-functional team.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a scalable e-commerce platform with integrated payment processing and order management.
